divs: Sighting DetailsOk, this happens each night, in about an hour it will do the same thing...but as I was speaking with "them", a diamond formed, a star with a light surround it, it kept playing with me, and then when i slid my hand, it fell from the sky, and created a funnel cloud.. Here is 2 video's... one is what it looks like sometimes, a rainbow orb, and ones when it appears as the golden throne of the dead sea......and the next is what happens when i slid my hand, it fell from the sky and formed a funnel cloud... people think its haarp causing the **chem trails you call them, those are just the god's playing games haha, they are very very funny.... I have been taken out of my body, not my body but my spirit, and been flown by hands of wood through space... it was AWESOME haha!!!** Yea, i'm loved :-) Oh yea, these reports won't stop haha.... well until I get noticed :-P
